messages.subject: Re: --TURN OFF EMAIL NOTIFICATIONS---
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, but I prefer to work at getting Yahoo to look into the problem and fix it before I go to that extreme.  :-)  I m on too many lists to be checking that
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, but I prefer to work at getting Yahoo to look into the problem
and fix it before I go to that extreme. :-) I'm on too many lists
to be checking that many sites for new mail. They may have been
slow , but Yahoo has always been responsive to my queries.
Certainly, though, if someone is receiving 24 copies of the same
messages... damn, I'd take Tiffany's advice. Fortunately, I'm not
having that problem.

phil (lucky for once)

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <tnamwong@w...> wrote:
> You all have to edit membership and turn off email
> notifications...unless you want your inboxes filled...
>
> :(
